author: Kevin Breuninger
title: Trump says other countries must deal with ISIS as US announces withdrawal from northern Syria
description: Trump said that the Kurds, who fought ISIS in the region, have been paid "massive amounts of money and equipment" by the U.S.
content:
President Donald Trump took to Twitter on Monday to explain his decision to pull U.S. troops away from Syria's northern border, where neighboring Turkey is expected to launch military operations against Kurdish soldiers there.
In a five-part thread of tweets… [+2321 chars]
